props.name: model
props.description: MenuModel instance to define the action items.

props.name: visible
props.description: Specifies the visibility of the overlay.

props.name: direction
props.description: Specifies the opening direction of actions.

props.name: transitionDelay
props.description: Transition delay step for each action item.

props.name: type
props.description: Specifies the opening type of actions.

props.name: radius
props.description: Radius for *circle types.

props.name: mask
props.description: Whether to show a mask element behind the speeddial.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the component is disabled.

props.name: hideOnClickOutside
props.description: Whether the actions close when clicked outside.

props.name: buttonClass
props.description: Style class of the button element.

props.name: maskStyle
props.description: Inline style of the mask element.

props.name: maskClass
props.description: Style class of the mask element.

props.name: showIcon
props.description: Show icon of the button element.

props.name: hideIcon
props.description: Hide icon of the button element.

props.name: rotateAnimation
props.description: Defined to rotate showIcon when hideIcon is not present.

props.name: class
props.description: Style class of the element.

props.name: style
props.description: Inline style of the element.

props.name: tooltipOptions
props.description: Whether to display the tooltip on items. The modifiers of Tooltip can be used like an object in it. Valid keys are 'event' and 'position'.

props.name: buttonProps
props.description: Used to pass all properties of the ButtonProps to the button component.

props.name: actionButtonProps
props.description: Used to pass all properties of the ButtonProps to the item component.

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Defines a string value that labels an interactive list element.

props.name: ariaLabelledby
props.description: Identifier of the underlying list element.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: pt
props.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

props.name: ptOptions
props.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

props.name: unstyled
props.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

parameters.name: scope
scope
scope

emits.name: click
emits.description: Fired when the button element clicked.

emits.name: show
emits.description: Fired when the actions are visible.

emits.name: hide
emits.description: Fired when the actions are hidden.

emits.name: focus
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the component receives focus.

emits.name: blur
emits.description: Callback to invoke when the component loses focus.

template:
<SpeedDial :model="items" :radius="80" type="semi-circle" direction="up" style="position: absolute; left: calc(50% - 2rem); bottom: 0" />
<SpeedDial :model="items" :radius="80" type="semi-circle" direction="down" style="position: absolute; left: calc(50% - 2rem); top: 0" />
<SpeedDial :model="items" :radius="80" type="semi-circle" direction="left" style="position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 2rem); right: 0" />
<SpeedDial :model="items" :radius="80" type="semi-circle" direction="right" style="position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 2rem); left: 0" />
